question.questionText: Look at the schematic diagram. What will happen to the other 2 bulbs if the middle bulb burns out?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: If the middle bulb burns out the other 2 bulbs will stay lit.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The other 2 will still light.
They will stay lit.
Only the middle bulb will go out.
They will stay light.
